page.title: 15RECREATION Cont.
page.content: {Horse riding}is extremely popular around Kineton. The Warwickshire Hunt stables and Kennels are found at Little Kineton while riding lessons can be had at Pittern Hill Riding Stables in the indoor school. Various other clubs are organised within the community. An old time Dancing group, K.A.D.S_ Kineton {Amateur Dramatic Society,}Darby and Joan and Mother and Toddler groups meet in the Village Hall. The Methodist Schoolroom provides a home for the Brownies and{Girl Guides,}the Playgroup and the Manchester Unity Oddfellows. The Cub Scouts,{Scouts}and Venture Scouts have their own H.Q. in Park Piece and Junior(11_14) and Senior Clubs meet at the Youth Centre attatched to the High School. The Young Farmers also meet there.
